channel.title: Chicago War Rock Girls on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Chicago War Rock Girls on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: rock and roll star
item.description: The last couple days have been rather fun. I had a good ime hanging out with my friend mike and his friend sherwin. They are so so funny. We went to star wars.. which relaly sucked. but ok whatever. yoda rules. we hung out a lot. ate a lot and drank some. got into figths at punk rock shows.. hehe. just kidding. we just hang out. but in such a way that is only possible in chicago.
